mapper.select: select id,description,hot,hotTime,name,price,picture,specialPrice,specialPriceTime, stock from t_product where hot=1 order by hotTime desc
select id,description,hot,hotTime,name,price,picture,specialPrice,specialPriceTime, stock from t_product where specialPrice=1 order by specialPriceTime desc
select count(*) from t_product where bigtypeId=#{bigtypeId}

select * from (select rownum rom,p.* from ( select id,description,hot,hotTime,name,price,picture,specialPrice,specialPriceTime,stock,bigtypeId,smallTypeId from t_product where bigtypeId=#{bigtypeId}) p) where rom>#{start} and rom<#{end}
select count(*) from t_product where smallTypeId=#{smallTypeId}

select * from (select rownum rom,p.* from ( select id,description,hot,hotTime,name,price,picture,specialPrice,specialPriceTime,stock,bigtypeId,smallTypeId from t_product where smallTypeId=#{smallTypeId}) p) where rom>#{start} and rom<#{end}
select count(*) from t_product where name=#{name}

select * from (select rownum rom,p.* from ( select id,description,hot,hotTime,name,price,picture,specialPrice,specialPriceTime,stock,bigtypeId,smallTypeId from t_product where name=#{name}) p) where rom>#{start} and rom<#{end}
select id,description,hot,hotTime,name,price,picture,specialPrice,specialPriceTime,smallTypeId,bigtypeId, stock from t_product where id=#{id}
